ticket.title: Tickets
ticket.description: Please create a ticket to get help from our support team. This way we can track your request and get back to you as soon as possible.

unisat.title: Unisat Issue
unisat.description: We are having some issues with non taproot addresses on unisat. We are working on a fix. Keep an eye on the update channel :eyes: .

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: Make sure that the highest role of BitCheck is above the roles you want to give to your users.

known-issue.title: Known Issue
known-issue.description: Before starting a ticket, please read https://discord.com/channels/1085583960513458226/1085662955498110996. The isse you are experiencing might be a known issue that we are working on.
